page.title: 11HOUSES ON WHALSAY
page.content: On Whalsay houses belong to three categories.There are older,often croft ,houses;council houses and newer private-owned houses. There are 84 council house on Whalsay with schemes at Gardentown,North Park, Saeter,Harlsdale and Tripwell.Recently some 6 of these have been bought by the tenants. There have been a lot of new houses built in the last 10 years.16 council houses at Harlsdale in 1975,24 council houses at Tripwell in 1979-80 and also about 39 privately owned.Two building firms are based on the island.At the moment(June 1985) 6 new houses are being built,5 others have been finished,and occupied,this year. Building costs are high,a typical house costing Â£50,000.This is the cost of the building as the site comes from relations and costs very little.
